mapper.select: SELECT food_name, st_grams, cal, carb, fat, prot, na FROM food WHERE food_name = #{foodName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food ( food_name, st_grams, cal, carb, fat, prot, na ) VALUES ( #{foodName}, #{stGrams}, #{cal}, #{carb}, #{fat}, #{prot}, #{na} )
mapper.update: UPDATE food SET st_grams = #{stGrams}, cal = #{cal}, carb = #{carb}, fat = #{fat}, prot = #{prot}, na = #{na} WHERE food_name = #{foodName}
